page.title: 19LANGHOLM_BY A YOUNG PERSON
page.content: {LANGHOLM}IS LIKE ONE BIG FAMILY.PEOPLE KNOW YOU GO TO THE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND THEY CARE ABOUT YOU.OUR PARENTS TREAT US VERY WELL.EVERYONE SAYS,"HELLO",IN THE STREET.IT'S QUITE SAFE EVEN AT NIGHT.I WOULD NOT LIKE TO LIVE ANYWHERE ELSE.THERE'S PLENTY TO DO HERE.IT'S QUITE {OLD FASHIONED}.IT'S NICE TO GO SHOPPING,HAND IN THE LIST(LINE)AND LATER A BOY DELIVERS THE GROCERIES ON AN OLD BIKE WITH NO GEARS.I THINK THE FUTURE LOOKS GOOD FOR YOUNG PEOPLE.THERE ARE ENOUGH JOBS NOT LIKE IN OTHER PLACES.I WANT TO BE A JOINER LIKE MY GRANDFATHER.A LOT OF PARENTS AND TEACHERS ARE QUITE CONCERNED ABOUT OUR {SECONDARY SCHOOL BECAUSE {NUMBERS ARE FALLING}AND SMALLER SCHOOLS ARE HARDER TO RUN.DESPITE ALL THIS, IT IS A GREAT PLACE TO LIVE.
